oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Frances Popham correspondence with Mary Mildred Jones, 1945 June 25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Popham, Frances
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Frances Popham to friend Mary Mildred Jones, in which she discusses her husband being discharged, and her experience with him coming home.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Soldiers -- United States -- 20th century -- History; World War, 1939-1945
Jones, Mary Mildred; Popham, Frances
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Thomas R. Jones, Sr. World War II correspondence
